name: TerrableShephard
description:
A simple game made for the Mini-Jam 101: Limit with the restriction "Control the environment". 

Move as many sheep as possible in 90 seconds into the dedicated "Sheep storage hole" (whatever that means).

The controls are simply point and click!

The game was more of an experiment to learn Unity's Job system to modify meshes in real-time than a real game.  After the first playthrough, there are additional buttons to spawn extra holes and sheep to tank the FPS completely.
